text: a stir-fry is a great way to get all
your vegetables for the day and this
cauliflower stir-fry goes one step
further it eliminates the grain we're
going to pulse cauliflower and it's
going to become the texture and
consistency of rice but it's even more

cauliflower florets and pulse them in a
food processor until they become about
the size and shape of rice looks great
now let's go steam it start by adding a
tablespoon of coconut oil we're going to
use half of a red onion the other half
is going to come into play later just
kind of eyeball it all right and then
two cloves of garlic minced we're going
to use the other two and a little bit
later little pinch of salt so I'm using

and the garlic
it really takes it to a very nice sort

the cauliflower is going to saute
